name: API Developer
description: An API Developer is responsible for designing, building, and maintaining APIs that allow applications and services to communicate. They work with cloud platforms, API management tools, and programming languages to ensure secure, scalable, and efficient integrations.
responsibilities: Design and implement RESTful and GraphQL APIs
Ensure APIs are secure, scalable, and well-documented
Collaborate with frontend and backend teams
Optimize performance and handle versioning of APIs
Use CI/CD pipelines for deployment and testing

name: Citizen Developer
description: A Citizen Developer builds applications using low-code or no-code platforms, enabling non-professional developers to contribute to digital solutions. They help teams automate workflows and create applications without extensive coding experience.
responsibilities: Develop apps using low-code/no-code platforms
Automate workflows for business teams
Collaborate with IT and professional developers
Ensure app security and data integrity
Maintain and update existing citizen apps

name: Cloud Digital Leader
description: A Cloud Digital Leader drives digital transformation initiatives within an organization. They guide cloud adoption, optimize cloud spending, and ensure teams align with strategic goals while leveraging cloud technologies effectively.
responsibilities: Lead cloud adoption and digital transformation strategies
Optimize cloud costs and resource utilization
Provide guidance to technical and business teams
Ensure security and compliance best practices are followed
Foster innovation through cloud technologies

name: Cloud Engineer
description: A Cloud Engineer is responsible for designing, deploying, and managing cloud infrastructure. They work with both cloud platforms and automation tools to ensure systems are scalable, secure, and highly available.
responsibilities: Design and implement cloud infrastructure
Automate deployments using Terraform and Ansible
Manage Kubernetes clusters and virtual machines
Monitor and optimize cloud performance
Ensure security, backup, and disaster recovery

name: Cloud Architect
description: A Cloud Architect designs cloud solutions and infrastructure, ensuring alignment with business requirements and technical standards. They focus on scalability, security, and cost optimization of cloud environments.
responsibilities: Design and architect cloud infrastructure
Implement scalable and secure cloud solutions
Define standards and best practices for cloud usage
Collaborate with engineering and operations teams
Optimize costs and ensure high availability

name: Cloud Developer
description: A Cloud Developer builds, deploys, and maintains applications in cloud environments. They leverage cloud-native services and tools to develop scalable, reliable, and efficient applications.
responsibilities: Develop cloud-native applications using GCP services
Deploy and manage applications on Cloud Run, Firebase, and App Engine
Write clean, efficient, and maintainable code
Collaborate with cloud architects and other developers
Ensure application security, performance, and scalability

name: Contact Center Engineer
description: A Contact Center Engineer designs, implements, and maintains cloud-based contact center solutions. They work with AI-powered tools and communication platforms to optimize customer interactions and workflows.
responsibilities: Design and implement cloud contact center solutions
Integrate AI tools for customer interactions
Develop and test Dialogflow agents and workflows
Collaborate with customer support and IT teams
Monitor performance and optimize system reliability

name: Data Analyst
description: A Data Analyst collects, processes, and analyzes data to provide actionable insights. They work with databases, visualization tools, and analytics platforms to support business decisions.
responsibilities: Analyze datasets to identify trends and patterns
Create dashboards and visualizations for stakeholders
Collaborate with business and technical teams
Ensure data accuracy and consistency
Support decision-making with data-driven insights

name: Data Engineer
description: A Data Engineer builds and maintains data pipelines, ensuring data is accessible, reliable, and properly structured for analytics. They work with ETL tools, cloud services, and databases to support data-driven decision-making.
responsibilities: Design, build, and maintain data pipelines
Transform and structure data for analytics
Integrate data from multiple sources
Collaborate with data analysts and scientists
Ensure data quality, consistency, and availability

name: Database Engineer
description: A Database Engineer designs, manages, and optimizes databases for cloud applications. They ensure data is structured efficiently, secure, and highly available for analytics and operational workloads.
responsibilities: Design and maintain cloud-based databases
Optimize database performance and queries
Ensure data integrity, security, and backups
Collaborate with developers and data engineers
Support analytics and operational data needs

name: DevOps Engineer
description: A DevOps Engineer automates and manages cloud infrastructure, ensuring efficient development, deployment, and operations. They focus on CI/CD pipelines, infrastructure as code, and system reliability.
responsibilities: Design, implement, and maintain CI/CD pipelines
Automate cloud infrastructure using Terraform and scripts
Manage Kubernetes clusters and deployments
Monitor system performance and reliability
Collaborate with development and operations teams

name: Google Workspace Administrator
description: A Google Workspace Administrator manages and configures Google Workspace services for organizations. They ensure smooth operation, security, and user support across Gmail, Drive, and other Workspace apps.
responsibilities: Manage user accounts and permissions in Google Workspace
Configure and maintain Gmail, Drive, and other apps
Automate administrative tasks using Apps Script
Ensure security and compliance across Workspace services
Support users and troubleshoot technical issues

name: Hybrid and Multi-Cloud Architect
description: A Hybrid and Multi-Cloud Architect designs and implements cloud solutions across multiple platforms. They ensure seamless integration, scalability, and security across GCP, AWS, and Azure environments.
responsibilities: Design and implement hybrid and multi-cloud architectures
Ensure security, scalability, and reliability across clouds
Automate deployments and infrastructure management
Integrate services across GCP, AWS, and Azure
Collaborate with development and operations teams

name: Machine Learning Engineer
description: Machine Learning Engineer проєктує, розробляє та впроваджує моделі машинного навчання для вирішення бізнес-завдань. Працює з наборами даних, ML-фреймворками та хмарними AI-сервісами для створення масштабованих і надійних рішень.
responsibilities: Проєктувати, навчати та впроваджувати моделі машинного навчання
Попередньо обробляти та аналізувати набори даних
Оптимізувати продуктивність та точність моделей
Співпрацювати з дата-інженерами та аналітиками
Інтегрувати ML-моделі в продукційні системи

name: Network Engineer
description: A Network Engineer designs, deploys, and manages cloud network infrastructure. They ensure secure, reliable, and scalable connectivity across cloud environments, optimizing network performance and reliability.
responsibilities: Design and implement cloud network architectures
Configure VPNs, VPCs, and routers
Monitor and optimize network performance
Ensure security and compliance of network traffic
Collaborate with DevOps and cloud teams

name: Security Engineer
description: A Security Engineer designs and implements security measures to protect cloud infrastructure and applications. They monitor threats, enforce policies, and ensure compliance across GCP environments.
responsibilities: Design and implement cloud security strategies
Monitor security threats and incidents
Manage IAM roles and access controls
Conduct vulnerability assessments and remediation
Ensure compliance with security standards and best practices

name: Startup Cloud Engineer
description: A Startup Cloud Engineer designs and manages cloud infrastructure for startups, focusing on rapid development, scalability, and cost-efficiency. They leverage cloud services to accelerate product delivery.
responsibilities: Design and deploy cloud infrastructure for startup applications
Optimize for cost, performance, and scalability
Automate deployments and infrastructure management
Integrate cloud services to accelerate development
Collaborate with development and product teams

name: Generative AI Leader
description: Responsible for implementing and managing generative AI solutions in the company, coordinating ML engineers and developers teams.
responsibilities: Develop strategies for using Generative AI
Coordinate AI/ML teams
Implement and optimize AI models
Monitor AI system performance and security
